title: Client never stops loading

replies.body: I noticed that you've already tried the Alternate Installer, whiiiiiiich kind of rules out my usual second troubleshooting step for this issue. Dang, no worries though. Let's grab that [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) again and try running it with **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** to make sure you get a fresh copy of the game. if that doesn't help, go ahead and reach back out to our techies for some more in-depth troubleshooting.
